alert.note: Alert for Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LYCOMING... SOUTHEASTERN POTTER...SOUTHWESTERN TIOGA AND NORTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from west of Mansfield to southwest of Wellsboro to miles northwest of Jersey Shore to northwest of Lock Haven. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cedar Run around 610 PM EDT. Slate Run, Cammal and Leetonia around 615 PM EDT. Leonard Harrison State Park around 620 PM EDT. Wellsboro, English Center and Waterville around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Ski Sawmill Ski Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Potter; Tioga
